alert.note: Alert for Hill County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 01 at 8:34PM MST until December 02 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow ending by midnight. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Hill County and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until Noon MST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.

area.areaDesc: Hill County; Western and Central Chouteau County
